topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee52a36368720b0e660c00#post_54ee52a36368720b0e660c00
No offense to pokemon fans, but when you get down to it pokemon's morals are up their ass cause "play with your favorite pokemon..... But if you play with your favorite pokemon instead and actually enjoy the games don't even fucking bother trying to win competitions with them shitlord"

What I mean by this:
Pokemon:
Winning > Competitiveness >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> playing with pokemon you like


Idunno games where it's intentionally stacked to where if you don't play how the creators want you you instantly die don't appeal to me.  I know it's a completely different genre all together, but I love LoL; I play it at least once a day; why do I love it so much?  Cause even though it's not the greatest game and obviously there are champions that are overpowered it doesn't force you to play champions you fucking despise to win.  Hell I could play adc Ahri (Ahri's my fav btw) against 5 tanks and while I would get killed a lot I could still have a chance at winning; no matter how stacked the match is you still have a very decent chance of winning.  No one is making you play Teemo and going, "if you don't play Teemo even though you fucking despise him then don't bother playing".



I know my dislike towards pokemon is irrational, but I have no interest in ever playing the games again because I would rather lose with a pokemon I like rather than forgo any and all enjoyment for the sake of winning.


Also have a joke: How does Smogon replace a bulb?  They don't; they just ban the bulb for being broken.

Tl:dr; I would rather lose with a character I like than win characters I fucking hate.  Imagine a game where you *HAVE* to play as characters you want to throttle to win.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee52a36368720b0e660c00#post_54ee52a36368720b0e660c00
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee51af6368725204200000#post_54ee51af6368725204200000
Yeeah. I love Liam but the whole "GEN1 WUZ BEST ALL OTHERZ SUK" mentality is fucking stupid. Hell I'd argue that Red, Blue, Green, and Yellow are thw WORST mainstream Pokemon games.[/bq]
Agreed. Sure, they may be the first, so they get _some_ excuse for not being as innovative as the following games, but that doesn't change the fact that they really can't compare. Kanto in general is my least favorite region, it just feels so plain to me.

"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee5328636872512ee60200#post_54ee5328636872512ee60200
[bq="And Brother I Hurt People"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee52a36368720b0e660c00#post_54ee52a36368720b0e660c00

They were good for their time, but they've aged like absolute shit. Actually, you can say that for almost all pokemon games. Even Pearl, which I consider to be one of the game's best series', isn't looking too hot. [/bq]
Diamond is probably the one I put the most hours into (unless I'm not remembering correctly and it's Platinum), but going back to it, it really doesn't look to good to me. Platinum is still fully playable for me though, oddly enough.

"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee52cc6368724f76c60000#post_54ee52cc6368724f76c60000
